messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] OCD and other disorders was:Addictive Personality Disorder
messages.msgSnippet: I have actually.  None of his behaviours is severe enough to make me want to seek meds for him though.  Although we did threaten to get him a full body cast
messages.messageBody:
I have actually. None of his behaviours is severe enough to make me want
to seek meds for him though. Although we did threaten to get him a full
body cast until his cuts healed once! (We were joking - don't jump on me
again!)

Bridget


On Mon, 10 Sep 2001 12:08:25 -0700 (PDT) Sharon Rudd
<bearspawprint@...> writes:
> Bridgette
> Have you considered Tourette's??? It presesnts in an
> infinit variety of tics. Scratch and sniff is pretty
> common. Tourette's often shows up in OCD families.
> There is a genetic relationship to both disorders.
> Meds, therapy, and support groups DO help.
>
> Sharon
>
~~~~If electricity comes from electrons...does that mean that morality
comes from morons?~~~~
I sent my Soul through the Invisible,
Some letter of that After-life to spell;
And by and by my Soul returned to me,
And answered, "I Myself am Heaven and Hell." -- The Rubaiyat
